text: Jo maal Allah ne tujhey diya hai ussey aakhirat ka ghar banane ki fikar kar, aur duniya mein se bhi apna hissa faramosh na kar. Ehsan kar jis tarah Allah ne tere saath ehsan kiya hai, aur zameen mein fasaad barpa karne ki koshish na kar, Allah mufsidon (fasaad karne waalon) ko pasand nahin karta.â€
